next_jobs.title: Curate Global News and Finance Feeds
next_jobs.instructions: Collect and document high-quality, non-social media news and finance data sources in /data/news_sources/.

next_jobs.title: Bootstrap API Resale Engine
next_jobs.instructions: Create /engines/api_resale/ with scripts to wrap and resell finance/news APIs.

next_jobs.title: Implement Market Signal Aggregator
next_jobs.instructions: Develop /engines/signal_aggregator/ to ingest and normalize global market signals.

next_jobs.title: Develop Arbitrage Opportunity Engine
next_jobs.instructions: Build /engines/arbitrage/ for cross-market price discrepancy detection.

next_jobs.title: Document Data Sources and Licensing
next_jobs.instructions: Update /docs/DATA_SOURCES.md with all external sources and licensing terms.

next_jobs.title: Set Up Engine Output Tests
next_jobs.instructions: Add /tests/ for validating outputs and ROI metrics of each engine.
